name: The Doonesbury Election Game Campaign '96
summary: Manage a presidential campaign in the 1996 election in "the most comprehensive and challenging election strategy game ever designed." Pair such unlikely opponents as George Wallace and Shirley Chisholm, or the actual matchup of Bob Dole, Ross Perot and Bill Clinton. Even choose candidates from the past like JFK -- 60 different candidates at your disposal. Staff your campaign with such Doonesbury characters as Zonker, Duke, Lacey or even Mike.
